bs-pageaccess-error-not-member-of-given-: You are not a member of the given groups. In order to prevent you from locking yourself out, saving was disabled.
bs-pageaccess-error-included-forbidden-t: You have tried to use the template "$1" to which you do not have read access. In order to prevent you from locking yourself out, saving was disabled.
bs-pageaccess-tag-groups-desc: Defines the groups which have exclusive access to a page. Several groups are separated by commas.
log-description-bs-pageaccess: This is a log of changes in the page access settings.
logentry-bs-pageaccess-change: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has changed}} the access permissions of $3 to "$4"
right-pageaccess-viewspecialpage: Grants access to the special page [[Special:PageAccess]].
bs-pageaccess-access-restricted: Access to this page is restricted to {{PLURAL:$1|the group|the groups}} $2.
bs-pageaccess-tag-pageaccess-desc: Restricts read and write access for this page to the groups named below
bs-pageaccess-tag-pageaccess-desc-param-: Only these groups have access to the page
